doc.title: John Saul's Blackstone Chronicles
doc.plot: The ghost of your father has kidnapped your son and placed him somewhere inside the asylum where your father used to work, now set to become a museum. As you search the asylum, you encounter the ghosts of some of the inmates. Each inmate holds clues to help you find your son, but they will only reveal their secrets after you retrieve a stolen personal item of theirs. However, as you find each item, you find yourself caught in a deadly trap. You must survive each trap and find your son that night, or he will be lost to your father forever.
